reviews.review_msg: This is a non-credit course, kind of a language course. But I have to say that it is not very easy to get at least B in INTG100 to pass ALC, at least for his students. Maybe because this course is not curve, and you need to get a high grade(B above is 75+ ) However, Jason's standard is not low. I got the highest mark in his two sections but only A-
HE IS REALLY NICE. Just choose him and you won't regret.
